p: A total of 15 AGE outbreaks were reported to the Jinan CDC from June 2015 to March 2017. Of the 15 outbreaks, 4 (26.7%) occurred in kindergartens, 2 (13.3%) in high schools, 6 (40.0%) in colleges, 2 (13.3%) in residential districts and 1 (6.7%) at a construction site ( Table 1). According to the field investigation reports, a total of 1194 people were affected in these 15 outbreaks. The index cases were enrolled into the field investigations of these outbreaks.
